website_summaries.verdict: A 1970s inspired sneaker comes in the form of the Adidas Haven. The retro-looking shoe provides a great amount for comfort for the foot as it also gives off a light and breathable feeling for the wearer. A versatile, vintage, stylish look offered at a great price, one can almost do no wrong with these pair of kicks.
pros: The Adidas Haven is a really comfortable shoe as what a majority of the reviewers have expressed
Some of the reviewers have mentioned that the shoe is really lightweight
Most of the wearers appreciate how this Adidas sneaker goes well with various kinds of attires
Some reviewers have noted that the shoe is great during the hot weather
Quite a good number of reviewers have praised the good quality of the shoe
A good number of reviewers have pointed out that they would highly recommend the shoe
A lot of the reviewers have really loved the colorways of the Haven from Adidas
A handful of reviewers are highly appreciative of the stylish look of the shoe
The shoe is available in various colorways to choose from
cons: The Adidas Haven is narrow or tight in fitting, according to a couple of reviewers
A few users have complained about the shoe’s poor quality

customer_reviews.title: One size too small (for me).
customer_reviews.text: These shoes as some reviewers have stated are probably one size too small. I've uploaded a photo of them next to a pair of Reeboks - both the same size 9.5 ( Reeboks fit comfortably ). I bought these in the sale and unfortunately the seller did not have the next size up in my chosen colour and the price had jumped up so reluctantly returning them. Never got to try them ! Yours may be ok but at the time of writing I think mine's the 5th review complaining of the smaller size fit.
customer_reviews.author: MrP

customer_reviews.title: Top Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Adidas trainers, both in terms of comfort and style. These are super comfy, and they look great too - they fit as expected, and it feels like you're wearing something that is well-made and of good quality. I like the fact there are patches of slightly off-white suede, which means they're not too white and garish. Will definitely buy Adidas again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Size is little smaller than other Adidas trainers
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought another pair of Adidas trainers albeit a different model. Whereas other pair fit perfectly, this pair are a smaller fit. The actual length might be OK, but it feels like the insoles are extra thick. Heel wants to come out of the back, and toes are under pressure from above. This is after only a week of wear so hopefully the will loosen out a little with wear. Nice looking trainer though. Update.. Can't remember how long I've had these trainers but they have held up really well. Don't wear them all the time but very little aging .. impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking Adidas Haven training shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great looking Adidas Haven training shoes, usual Adidas quality, good navy colour, two pairs of laces - one white and one navy, thick sole which has a good bounce when running. But for me they are slightly on the large size and are more suited to a broader foot. I paid a reasonable price so I am happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Retro Nix

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too small
customer_reviews.text: Nice trainers at a good price but quite a bit smaller in the toe than all my other Adidas trainers. I'm exchanging them for a half size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Taliesyn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and extremely comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a half size up, following the advice of others. Perfect fit and extremely comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Neville

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Lovely trainers, if you wear with a sports sock probably go I/2 size up as they come up a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Dawro

customer_reviews.title: Walk with style, love Adidas Haven
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed! This shoes are great, look solid, very light and then the retro style is amazing. Everyone needs a pair of shoes like these, seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Tonino

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Unexpected fit as I got 8 half when I'm a size 8
customer_reviews.author: Senpainoob

customer_reviews.title: A good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Nice pair of trainers. No frills but a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Simon White

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Stitching on front upper burst after 6 months of wear
customer_reviews.author: basil6

customer_reviews.title: Initially great, but now faulty
customer_reviews.text: Initially over the moon with these trainers, but after three months of light wear, one of the soles has split right across the base of the shoe. They are now not wearable if it is damp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The product was fine but both trainers soles split after 3 months within ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was fine but both trainers soles split after 3 months within days of each other which is very disappointing as i dontvwear them that often!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen grimaldi

customer_reviews.title: Very small fitting
customer_reviews.text: These trainers fit very small compared to other Adidas trainers I currently have.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Elward

customer_reviews.title: Return address
customer_reviews.text: What can I do , they are to small ??
customer_reviews.author: richard cooke

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Haven Trainers
product_meta.description: Mens Haven shoes made of shiny mesh upper with premium suede overlays and comfortable mesh lining. Enjoy the comfort and performance of OrthoLite sockliner. The two-color, stamped EVA midsole and the rubber outsole provide lightweight cushioning. The shoe is visually rounded by the 3-strip of synthetic leather and the printed "haven" letter in metallic look.
feature_bullets: Outer material made from shimmering mesh.
